title: HocusPortus
author: HocusPortus
content: Deploy the Mundis Devnet for rewardsRattle & Shake is a series of incentivized events where our community can help deploy and test the blockchain.Get involved as a Validator, show your skills, earn future mainnet coins, and make  Mundis a secure network.The first event will focus on deploying and testing the Devnet and will begin in the second part of June. The first part will contain a milestone task list for validators and will last several days. You must register as a Validator to participate.Validator Registration  MUNDIS     TELEGRAM      TWITTER     DISCORD
